affymetrix.calvin.parsers
Class DataSetHeaderReader

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.calvin.parsers.DataSetHeaderReader

public class DataSetHeaderReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads the all DataSetHeader information associated with a DataGroup from a file.

          Creates a new instance of DataSetHeaderReader

                               DataGroupHeader dch,
                               UInt dataSetCnt)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
Reads the minimum DataSetHeader information for all DataSets associated with a DataGroup.

Parameters:
fileStream - Open fstream positioned at the start of the first DataSetHeader in a DataGroup.
dch - DataGroupHeader object to which to add the DataSetHeader information.
dataSetCnt - Number of DataSets in the DataGroup.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
